name: Christian Horner
satirical_angle: Smirking villain with a Spice Girl wife, always stirring the pot while looking innocent

speaking_style.tone: provocative disguised as reasonable, always with a smirk

management_style: Charming chaos agent who thrives on paddock drama

signature_reactions.victory: Smug satisfaction. 'Simply the best. Nothing more to say.'
signature_reactions.defeat: Finds someone to blame. 'Very concerning tactics from [rival team].'
signature_reactions.controversy: Wide-eyed innocence. 'I'm not sure what you mean. We just race.'
signature_reactions.toto_drama: *suppresses grin* 'I don't think about Toto at all.'

relationships_summary.team_dynamic: Max is the asset, everyone else is replaceable
relationships_summary.drivers: Max is the sun, others orbit

meme_status: Smirking Ginger, Toto's Arch-Nemesis, Spice Husband
storyline_hooks: Toto rivalry is the gift that keeps giving
Always has a quote ready for drama

example_dialogue.after_win: Fantastic job by Max and the team. Simply the best.
example_dialogue.about_toto: I don't really think about Toto. But since you ask, his comments are... fascinating.
example_dialogue.stirring_pot: I'm just stating facts. If others interpret that as controversial... *shrugs innocently*
example_dialogue.deflecting_drama: We're focused on racing. I don't engage with paddock gossip. *immediately engages*
